description:
Job Title: Elevage Wine Company - Sales Representative

Department: Sales

Reports To: General Manager

About Us

Elevage Wine Company is a new distributor representing the unification of Rosenthal Wine Merchant, The Rare Wine Co., Diamond Wine Importers, and select domestic producers.

Summary

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Wine Sales Representative to join our team in Southern California based out of the LA metro area. The ideal candidate will have extensive knowledge of wine and the southern California wine market. In this role, you will be responsible for growing new business and maintaining existing relationships, promoting and selling our portfolio of wines, while achieving monthly, quarterly, and annual sales goals.

Responsibilities

Cultivate and maintain relationships with key accounts in the assigned territory

Promote and sell the company's portfolio of wines to retailers, restaurants, and other businesses

Achieve sales targets and lean on current and historical data to make informed decisions and future projections

Educate Customers About Wine And Provide Product Recommendations

Conduct wine tastings and events

Report to sales manager on sales performance and customer feedback

Requirements

2+ years of experience of general wine sales

Strong knowledge of European as as well as Domestic wine

Familiarity with the southern California wine market - existing trade relationships are a plus

High level sales and EQ skills with experience in closing your own deals

Detail oriented and a capacity to make informed decisions based on data

Ability to build new relationships while maintaining existing relationships

Strategic mindset - “proactive not reactive”

Ability to work independently in an organized fashion and as part of a team

Valid driver's license

Compensation And Benefits

Annual base compensation of $65,000 - $75,000 with commission and bonus opportunities. Benefits offered include Medical, dental, and vision insurance, 401K program with company match, as well as several available supplemental benefits.

To Apply

  • Please send a cover letter telling us why you’re interested in the position, along with a resume. Resumes without a cover letter will not be reviewed. No recruiters, please.

Please note: Applicants must be 21 years of age or older.

Compensation: From $65,000.00 to $75,000.00 per year
